attributes.comment:
To whom it may concern, While it is good that you are trying to cut the times
down on the different processes, increasing the cost of the different fees also puts
up a barrier to those whom may not have a lot of money, and are trying to come to
this county in the legitimate legal way! And those people ought to be encouraged
and not discouraged by high costly fees which give a VERY UNWELCOMING
odor to the encounter with our country and the immigration service!!! I am
definitely not for illegal aliens coming to our country! But, for those who choose to
come the legal legitimate way, they ought to be welcomed(within reason
concerning security for our country)! In fact , the process ough to be made more
stream lined and welcoming! So, I am against raising already too high
processing fees!!!! Thank you for listening to my comments.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Mark E. Kessinger
